dialogue.question1: 1. Has something felt off with Connor to you?
dialogue.question2: 2. Has Chad been acting weird to you
dialogue.question3: 3. Alan has been pretty on edge, do you think happened?

responses.1: John: '..... stay away from that topic.'
responses.2: John: 'Chad is always weird with all those voices, if he was acting normal then I'd be concerned'
responses.3: John: 'Someone went through his room and put a dent in his safe, so I would be on edge too.'

intros: Chad: 'Hey buddy!!! Great to see you, come on in, I am just reading my DM manual'

dialogue.question1: 1. Have you seen Connor he has been acting a little different
dialogue.question2: 2. What do you think of John?

responses.1: Chad: 'Thats a weird question to ask you ok?'
responses.2: Chad: 'He is a little introverted but a lot of fun to game with'
responses.3: Chad: 'He is in his room someone destroyed it, not cool at all'

dialogue.question1: 1.'You talk to Chad about the game tonight?'
dialogue.question2: 2.'You worked with John right? You get along?'

responses.1: Connor: 'yes and if not I will'

intros: Alan: 'Hey young blood what do you need, I am just cleaning up'

responses.1: Alan: 'Chad is too busy with his elf dragon books to know what happened.'
responses.2: Alan: 'um....... no did you see anything'
responses.3: Alan: 'John doesn't leave his room he doesnt have to'
